body.name: Safety 1st TriMate All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, All-in-one Convertible with Rear-Facing, Forward-Facing, and Belt-Positioning Booster, High Street
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 12 hrs 44 mins
features: 3 MODES TRANSITION FROM BABY TO BIG KID Three modes of use accommodate children from birth to age 10: rear-facing (5–40 lbs. and 19"–40"), forward-facing (22–65 lbs. and 22"–49"), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs. and 43"–52").

FITS 3 ACROSS THE BACK SEAT The TriMate All-in-One Convertible Car Seat’s ultra-slim design— just 17” across without the cup holders —allows parents to fit three across the back seat without sacrificing comfort.

CLEAR, SIMPLE INSTALLATION AND ADJUSTMENT TriMate All-in-One features a 9-position headrest that adjusts quickly with just one hand, a hassle-free harness system that adjusts without complicated re-threading, and visible belt paths for easy installation.
KEEPS LITTLE ONES COZY Soft, memory-foam infant insert keeps small babies comfortable and secure.
EASY CLEAN-UP The seat includes two removable, dishwasher-safe cup holders and a removable seat pad (machine-washable and dryer-safe) for convenient cleanup after messy rides.
ADJUSTABLE BASE The TriMate All-in-One Convertible Car Seat’s base adjusts to three different positions for maximum comfort and safety.
body.description: The Safety 1st TriMate All-in-One Convertible Car Seat is built to grow with your child while keeping them secure and comfortable on the road. With three modes of use—rear-facing (5–40 lbs. and 19”–40”), forward-facing (22–65 lbs. and 22”–49”), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs. and 43”–52”)—the TriMate is ready to take your baby home from the hospital or your big kid to soccer practice. The seat’s ultra-slim design fits 3 across the back seat without sacrificing comfort. Fabric is machine-washable and dryer-safe. You’ll always get the best fit with the 3-position adjustable base, 1-hand-adjustable harness system, and 9-position headrest. It’s the only car seat your child will need from birth through age 10.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us The moment you decide to have kids, life gets very complicated. From setting up a nursery and finding a pediatrician, to drop offs, pick-ups, and play dates, it all goes totally haywire. But thanks to Safety 1st, there’s one thing that’s never complicated: safety. We make it easy to get what you need to take care of your little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is great! I trust this brand because I tried the high chairs for my boys, so I knew the car seats will not disappoint. I love the color and how comfortable it is for them. Plus it’s going to last awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good car seat.
reviews.reviewText: Good car seat. Good size. Narrow base, which is great! Very light weight. Only used a couple of times a month, so ots Good. Plastic is thinner, might not last 10 years if heavily used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but jiggly
reviews.reviewText: Cute car seats. But the one jiggles and is driving me bonkers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for a budget car seat
reviews.reviewText: I needed something for our trip but didn't want to spend too much. I know all car seats pass the same test in the US but this one just feels so flimsy compared to our regular car seats. I wouldn't buy this for a full time car seat, I don't feel like it gives all that much protection. Also the straps are SUPER annoying, if you pull on one side then it takes from the other side, so each time you put your child in you have to even out each strap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat!
reviews.reviewText: I love how this goes for all stages. So easy to use you don’t even need to look at the manual! Adjusts for all ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good looking car seat. Easy to install and adjust. Looks and feels far better than price suggests. Feels good and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well thought out design, versatile, easy adjustments; more narrow design helps preserve seat space
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice car seat. It is very versatile in the fact that it grows with baby. It can be used as a front facing or rear facing. It has three levels of recline and the height can be easily adjusted. What I really appreciate is that the car seat is a bit narrower than others I have come across. On trips its hard having car seat(s), especially large ones since they take up so much space. This one is a bit narrower which helps cut down on that but is still spacious enough to give baby plenty of room. I like how the majority of the car seat is covered in padded fabric which not only makes it look nice but makes it a bit more comfortable. Overall, this car seat is super versatile, good quality, and saves a bit of space.
